page.title: 20Little Wellhouse Farm (cont)
page.content: The farm has been effectively divided into two by the opening of the new A13 by-pass.The main change to the family has been a significant increase in noise level.The crops that are grown remain basically the same ie wheat and barley. Stables and working horses were once a feature of this farm,but at present there are no animals at all with the exception of a pet alsatian. The farmer is fairly self sufficient by tending to a sizeable vegetable plot.He grows potatoes , parsnips,runner beans,cabbages and tomatoes.However,none of these products are sold as the farmer has concentrated on producing just enough to meet the family needs.
